name: Duel Calc for Yu-Gi-Oh!
description:
The calculator with timer for your Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game duels!

FEATURES
+ Calculator designed specifically for Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game duels
+ Optimized key-pad
+ 40' Tournament match timer
+ Scrollable history score log
+ Dice roll and coin toss
+ iOS 9.0 Universal App
+ Soon new updates..

NOTES
This is a Premium App (one-time payment) without Ads or In-App purchases. iOS 9 required.

LEGAL NOTES
Yu-Gi-Oh! Calc is an unofficial App and is not endorsed by or affiliated with KONAMI Corporation.
Yu-Gi-Oh! and all related materials copyright © 1996 Kabuki Takahashi.
Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game, and all related materials copyright © KONAMI Corporation. All Rights Reserved.
This reference application is intended purely to informational purposes and to assist fans of the trading card game, furthermore is intended to be used alongside the trading card game.
Preview icons courtesy of icons8.com

SUPPORT
If you like, leave a good review to the AppStore! Thanks!
For critics, advice and support:
